title: Karen Donkin
deck: I am married to David, mum to Scott and Jonny and mother-in-law to Alex. I have lived in Acomb and have been part of Gateway for many years and LOVE this church! I work one day a week in the office, mainly with finances and stuff relating to the Centre. On Sundays I can sometimes be found serving refreshments or manning the Info desk. I also work part time in a local college, and when I'm not doing any of the above I enjoy reading, films and a good natter over a cuppa.
